com.iota.iri.service.tipselection.impl

Class WalkerAlpha

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iota.iri.service.tipselection.impl.WalkerAlpha
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Walker

    public class WalkerAlpha
extends java.lang.Object
implements Walker
    Implementation of Walker that performs a weighted random walk with e^(alpha*Hy) as the transition function.

      • walk

        public Hash walk(Hash entryPoint,
                 UnIterableMap<HashId,java.lang.Integer> ratings,
                 WalkValidator walkValidator)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: Walker
        Walk algorithm

        Starts from given entry point to select valid transactions to be used as tips. It will output a valid transaction as a tip.

        Specified by:
        walk in interface Walker
        Parameters:
        entryPoint - Transaction hash to start walk from.
        ratings - Map of ratings for each transaction that references entryPoint.
        walkValidator - Used to validate consistency of tails.
        Returns:
        Transaction hash of tip.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If DB fails to retrieve transactions
